text: 2009 FIFA Confederations Cup was the 8th FIFA Confederations Cup tournament. It took place in South Africa from 14 June to 28 June. Brazil won the tournament after defeating United States. Spain got third place. ==Results== ===Group stage=== ====Group A==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 8 0 +8 9 3 1 1 1 2 2 0 4 3 0 2 1 0 1 -1 2 3 0 1 2 0 7 -7 1 ====Group B==== Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts 3 3 0 0 10 3 +7 9 3 1 0 2 4 6 -2 3 3 1 0 2 3 5 -2 3 3 1 0 2 4 7 -3 3 ===Knockout stage=== {{Round4-with third |24 June – Bloemfontein||0||2 |25 June – Johannesburg||1||0 |28 June – Johannesburg||2||3 |28 June – Rustenburg| (aet)|3||2 }} ==References== ==Other websites== *RSSSF Category:FIFA Confederations Cup tournaments Category:2009 in association football Category:2009 in Africa Category:21st century in South Africa Category:June 2009 events Category:Football in South Africa
title: 2009 FIFA Confederations Cup
